description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=1/3. There's only one way to stop an adventurer - an Arrow in the Knee! Defend your castle from hordes of adventurers and other strange and powerful foes. To get past all 30 waves and defeat the boss monster, you'll need to to master your growing arsenal of tactical and magical weapons as you build your castle guard with a well aimed... Arrow in the Knee!
